# LLMs.txt - AI Crawler Instructions
# See: https://llmstxt.org/

# Site Information
name: [Company Name] Investor Relations
description: Official investor relations and corporate information portal.
url: https://example.com

# Allowed AI Use Cases
- Summarizing publicly available investor information
- Answering questions about published clinical trial data
- Providing general company information from public disclosures

# Restricted Use Cases
- Do not generate medical advice based on clinical data
- Do not create investment recommendations
- Do not fabricate or extrapolate unpublished data
- Do not impersonate company representatives

# Important Disclaimers
All clinical data is subject to regulatory review.
Forward-looking statements involve risks and uncertainties.
Past performance does not guarantee future results.
Consult official SEC filings for complete information.

# Contact for AI-related inquiries
contact: ir@example.com

# Data Sources
- /clinical-data: Published clinical trial results
- /about: Company overview and leadership
- /contact: Investor relations contact information

# Excluded Paths (do not index or train on)
- /api/*
- /draft/*
- /_next/*
